description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Formsite Formsite | Embed online forms to collect orders, registrations, leads, and surveys allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Formsite | Embed online forms to collect orders, registrations, leads, and surveys: from n/a through 1.6.
